perturbation.original_text: In consideration of the Agents' services to be rendered in connection with the Offering, the Corporation shall pay to the Agents a cash fee (the "Agents' Fee") equal to 7.0% of the gross proceeds of the Offering. As additional consideration, the Corporation shall issue to the Agents that number of compensation options (the "Compensation Options") equal to 3.5% of the number of Offered Shares sold pursuant to the Offering.
perturbation.changed_text: In consideration of the Agents' services to be rendered in connection with the Offering, the Corporation may pay to the Agents a cash fee (the "Agents' Fee") not to exceed 7.0% of the gross proceeds of the Offering. As additional consideration, the Corporation may issue to the Agents compensation options (the "Compensation Options") not to exceed 3.5% of the number of Offered Shares sold pursuant to the Offering.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states 'the Corporation shall pay', making the fee mandatory. The changed text introduces uncertainty by stating 'the Corporation may pay,' making it discretionary. The original text clearly defined the Agentsâ€™ Fee as equal to 7.0% of the gross proceeds of the Offering. However, the revised text introduced contradiction through flexibility by saying 'not to exceed 7.0%'. This creates uncertainty regarding payment terms.

perturbation.original_text: The Agents' Fee shall be apportioned among the Agents as follows: Dundee Securities Ltd. 40% Kes 7 Capital Inc. 30% Bloom Burton & Co. Ltd. 30% 100%
perturbation.changed_text: The Agents' Fee may be apportioned among the Agents based on a yet to be determined methodology. The initial suggestion is: Dundee Securities Ltd. 40% Kes 7 Capital Inc. 30% Bloom Burton & Co. Ltd. 30% 100%
perturbation.explanation: Original text: Fee apportionment is clearly defined. Changed text: Introduces uncertainty by making the apportionment method undetermined, while giving an initial suggestion, implying it could change, therefore generating uncertainty.

perturbation.original_text: The Corporation agrees that the Agents are acting as agents of the Corporation in seeking purchasers of Offered Shares without underwriter liability, and nothing in this Agreement or any other agreement shall require the Agents to purchase any of the Offered Shares in connection with the Offering.
perturbation.changed_text: The Corporation agrees that the Agents are acting as agents of the Corporation in seeking purchasers of Offered Shares without underwriter liability, however the Agents may purchase Offered Shares with mutual agreement between both parties. Nothing in this Agreement or any other agreement shall require the Agents to purchase any of the Offered Shares in connection with the Offering unless otherwise agreed upon.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states very clearly that Agents are under no obligation to purchase shares. The changed text creates uncertainty by saying 'Agents may purchase Offered Shares with mutual agreement', therefore creating uncertainty.
